metadata.title: CVE-2023-52561 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: arm64:dts: qcom: sdm845-db845c: Mark cont splash memory region as reserved Addinga reserved memory region for the framebuffer memory (the splash memoryregion set up by the bootloader). It fixes a kernel panic (arm-smmu:Unhandled context fault at this particular memory region) reported onDB845c running v5.10.y.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
